name: Toy King
description:
You control a wind up key, searching for your original host- er, toy! Use the help of the other toys along the way to platform to your new- old! I meant old- home~

Timed Platformer: Reach the end of each stage or run become unwound and fall flat...

Original Soundtrack: The music slaps- fitting for the technological advancement of the toy empire (as well as the local night scene)- the OST is freshly made!

Toy Vessels: Overtake toys by jumping into them and use their unique traits to progress the levels of the toy factory!
